title: Lakers Big 3 Confidence?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and David Jacoby debate if it means anything to them that the Lakers’ Big 3 reaffirmed their commitment to each other and how big of a deal it would be if Charles Barkley left TNT for LIV Golf.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Confident Should We Be In The Lakers' Big 3?
